thread.title: Amal Clooney looks radiant as she celebrates birthday with George in Barcelona
thread.title_full: Amal Clooney looks radiant as she celebrates birthday with George in Barcelona

title: Amal Clooney looks radiant as she celebrates birthday with George in Barcelona
text:
Amal Clooney looks radiant as she celebrates birthday with George in Barcelona February 04, 2017 by Emmy Griffiths Human rights lawyer Amal Clooney looked blooming as she walked through Barcelona airport in a loose-fitting jumper dress Leave a comment 
Happy birthday Amal Clooney ! The lawyer and her husband George Clooney celebrated her 39th birthday in Barcelona on Friday amid reports the couple are soon to expect the pitter patter of tiny feet. As HELLO! reported previously, the Lebanon Daily Star was the first to speculate that the couple could be expecting twins , quoting a family source who reportedly confirmed the happy news. 
VIEW GALLERY George and Amal celebrated their two-year wedding anniversary in September 
On Friday, all eyes were on Amal who looked radiant as she walked through Barcelona airport with her former ER star husband and his parents Nick and Nina, wearing a loose-fitting, camel-coloured jumper dress. Earlier in the week, the husband and wife duo celebrated her birthday by having dinner at the lavish Rooftop Smokehouse Restaurant. During their time on their trip, the human rights lawyer paused the celebrations to speak at the ADP ReThink Human Capital Management conference in a discussion which was moderated by her husband's dad, Nick.
